titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 31, United States Code, to improve the procurement protest system.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2651-2654)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Amends the Competition in Contracting Act of 1984 to revise the procurement protest system. Ratifies all amounts to which an interested party has been declared entitled by the Comptroller General pursuant to such Act as in effect immediately before the enactment of this Act. Specifies how such amounts are to be paid, subject to agency reimbursement.
